name: Functions, powers, and duties of director
text:
In the performance of, and with respect to, the functions, powers, and duties vested in the director by this chapter, the director of business, economic development, and tourism may:



	(1)	Prescribe rules and regulations to carry out this chapter.
	(2)	Perform all functions necessary to effectuate the purposes of this chapter. [L 1963, c 76, §5; Supp, §98R-5; HRS ; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 336, §7; am L 1990, c 293, §8]




Cross References
  Adoption of rules, see chapter 91.
